div.div: GUSD schools are closed to face to face instruction the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. GUSD will utilize the District website, school websites, email, and Parent Notification systems to communicate with families as we move forward with state directed distance learning and delivery of student meals.
VIEW MORE About Coronavirus (COVID-19) Update Letter for Families

a.title: Free Meals to School Aged Children

div.div: Free Meals to School Aged Children

At this time we want you to be aware that the District will be able to supply supplemental free meals to children under 18 during this initial school site closure. Initially the meals will be a breakfast and lunch served at Buckeye School of the Arts and Shasta Lake School. Breakfast will be available via drive up line from 7:30 am to 8 am and lunch from 11 :30 to 12 pm. These meals will be served Monday through Friday and continue to during spring break and indefinitely until otherwise noted.
VIEW MORE About Free Meals to School Aged Children

a.title: MEMORIAL DAY: No School - District Office closed

div.div: MEMORIAL DAY: No School - District Office closed

img.title: Local Indians for Education
img.style: width: 150px; height: 57px; text-align: center; float: left; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 5px;

br.br: When we bring together two things as edifying as education and culture, we are able to connect to ourselves and each other in a way that teaches us all something profound about life. We are all here to teach and to learn from one another in the most positive of ways.

The Shasta Lake Gateway Library has been a Nonprofit public library serving the community since January 1994. The Library's goal has always been to provide library services to the community, with the assistance of volunteers and "Friends of the Library" making regular donations of books, magazines, or money for the operation of the library.
The Shasta Lake Chamber of Commerce is a membership organization dedicated to meeting the needs of the business community by fostering economic opportunity and a favorable business climate.
